price: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Nta n’umwe mu bari mu birere no ku isi uzi ibyihishe uretse Allah, kandi ntibazi igihe bazazurirwa.”
arabic: قُل لَّا يَعۡلَمُ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُۚ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qul lā yaʿlamu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi al-ghayba illā al-lahu wamā yashʿurūna ayyāna yub'ʿathūna
